name: Meme Supreme  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
description: Welcome to the meme graveyard! Meme Supreme is a simple matching game with nostalgic meme references. Race against the clock to match all of the cards before the timer reaches zero! Do you have what it takes to reminisce these long-forgotten memes?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: a potato could probably run this game
